body_html:
I think we should keep the content of the cells displayed, but open to
hosting notebooks elsewhere to save on space. If we do host elsewhere,
let's put a single notebook in this directory that makes it clear how to
pull in the other notebooks pain-free.

On Mon, Aug 8, 2016 at 2:45 PM, Daniel W Mane notifications@github.com
wrote:

@craigcitro https://github.com/craigcitro maybe you can opine? :)

body:
I think we should keep the content of the cells displayed, but open to
hosting notebooks elsewhere to save on space. If we do host elsewhere,
let's put a single notebook in this directory that makes it clear how to
pull in the other notebooks pain-free.

On Mon, Aug 8, 2016 at 2:45 PM, Daniel W Mane notifications@github.com
wrote:

> @craigcitro https://github.com/craigcitro maybe you can opine? :)
